Class ec.evm$.EvmSecurityManager 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.SecurityManager
           |
           +----ec.evm$.EvmSecurityManager
public class EvmSecurityManager
extends SecurityManager
This is the SecurityManager which must be installed in order to run vats. It basically puts Java into full permissivity mode, so that the vat can do its natural capabilities thing.
